weirdDeals.name: Nothing
weirdDeals.description: What do you get for the person who has everything? Nothing — literally. But unlike traditional nothing, this one will cost you almost $7. It comes in different colors so hurry before supplies last.

weirdDeals.name: 30 pieces of fake garlic
weirdDeals.description: Take decorating with fake stuff to the next level with these fake garlic knobs. Get these and your kitchen will never look the same again.

weirdDeals.name: A horror movie sound maker
weirdDeals.description: Surprise guests by making them think IT is hiding just around the corner. You can make your own mimics too.

weirdDeals.name: A pizza hut
weirdDeals.description: Indulge in everyone's life-long desire of wearing pizza atop their head. Beware of the sprinkled parmesan as you nod or shake your head, though — some might mistake it for dandruff.

weirdDeals.name: A USB fridge
weirdDeals.description: Enjoy a cold one with one, single refrigerated beverage at your fingertips. No driver needed. Will work with any PC or Macintosh. Top selling colors are:
